content.html: In 2015, I heard a talk at @Google that inspired me to learn to code. I was working as an office manager/executive assistant, and with some encouragement from my new bf @tsmith, I started learning online and applied to @Hackbright. Many many rejections, jobs, and years later:
content.value:
In 2015, I heard a talk at @Google that inspired me to learn to code. I was working as an office manager/executive assistant, and with some encouragement from my new bf @tsmith, I started learning online and applied to @Hackbright.

Many many rejections, jobs, and years later:

photo.alt: Screenshot from LinkedIn: Senior Developer Advocate- Google (starting 7/25!)
